query: WITH entities AS (SELECT payment_id, created_at, id FROM core_obligation_installments WHERE ((payment_id = $1) AND (COALESCE((created_at, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY created_at ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: ObligationInstallmentId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_obligation_installment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.created_at asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
